session_summary: Deborah and Jolene had a conversation at 3:09 pm on 15 September, 2023. Deborah shared how reconnecting with her late mother's friends brought up a mix of emotions, but ultimately, it was comforting. Jolene supported her, mentioning how stories about loved ones can be both tough and comforting. Deborah found the experience with her mom's friends special as it offered insight into her mother's life. They discussed how old photos and memories strengthen their appreciation for loved ones. Deborah also shared her love for surfing and yoga, highlighting how these activities bring her peace. Jolene and Deborah discussed creating calm spaces for relaxation, with Jolene mentioning her room as a haven of peace. Additionally, Jolene showed a photo of her pet Susie, whom she adores for bringing comfort and brightness into her life.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a living room with a couch and a fire place
conversation_turns.text: Since speaking last, I reconnected with my mom's old friends. Their stories made me tear up and reminded me how lucky I am to have had her.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: It's great that you could reconnect with them. Hearing stories about our loved ones can be tough but also comforting.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Hearing stories about my mom was emotional. It was both happy and sad to hear things I hadn't heard before. It was a mix of emotions, but overall it was comforting to reconnect with her friends.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: It can bring up a range of emotions, and it's okay to feel a mix of happiness and sadness. Those moments with her friends must've been meaningful to you.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of two women in pajamas taking a selfie in a mirror
conversation_turns.text: Wow, it was so special. A glimpse into her life beyond what I knew. Through their eyes, I appreciate her more. Here I am and my mom.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: That looks like a blast! What did you and your mom's friends do on that day?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: We reminisced and looked through her photos. It was really sweet.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Looking at old photos must have been so nostalgic! It's great that you could share that experience with friends. It's amazing how photos and memories can give us a deeper appreciation for the people we love.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person walking on the beach with a surfboard
conversation_turns.text: Pictures really have a way of bringing back memories and making us appreciate the special bond we have with our loved ones. They remind me of how strong love is and how amazing human relationships can be. Just like this one.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Wow, what a gorgeous pic! Do you have any special memories of that beach or just love surfing in general?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: That beach is super special to me. It's where I got married and discovered my love for surfing. It's always filled with joy and peace.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: What pleasant memories.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a woman doing a yoga pose on the beach
conversation_turns.text: Here is another photo from my classes.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that yoga pose looks amazing! Does it help you relax?

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Oh yeah! Doing this on the beach is so peaceful - the ocean, sand, and fresh air create a super relaxing atmosphere. The perfect way to take care of myself.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photography of a couple of towels sitting on top of a table
conversation_turns.text: I like to create my own serene yoga space with candles and oils for extra chill vibes. Also, we tried a new style of meditation in Thailand - with flowers.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Oh, same for me!

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: I find calm when I do yoga or meditate. I use essential oils and put on some soft, soothing music in the background to create a peaceful atmosphere. It really helps me chill out and center myself.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: It's amazing how our environment can enhance our practice.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a bed with a colorful blanket and pillows
conversation_turns.query: cozy corner yoga mat cushions small plant
conversation_turns.text: Yeah, totally! Our surroundings can really affect our mood and how much zen we can get from our routine. Creating a place that feels safe and chill is key.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Wow, that looks so comfy and inviting! Where do you usually go to relax in your house?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: In my room, I usually go to relax and feel at ease. After a busy day, it's my little haven for peace and rest - the perfect spot to relax and recharge.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Sounds like your room does the job. That's awesome.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.blip_caption: a photo of a person holding a snake in a container
conversation_turns.text: Here are my pals keeping me company.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: Hey, that's Susie or Seraphim? How long has he been hanging out with you?

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: It`s Susie! I've had her for two years now.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: It's awesome how pets can bring us comfort and peace when we need it.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Susie is a great companion.

conversation_turns.speaker: Deborah
conversation_turns.text: The love pets give is priceless.

conversation_turns.speaker: Jolene
conversation_turns.text: Plus, they make life a lot brighter!

Deborah: Jolene reconnects with her mother's friends and gets nostalgic hearing about her stories from them and going over old photos.
Jolene: Jolene and her partner practice a new style of meditation in Thailand with flowers.

Deborah: Deborah reconnected with her late mother's friends, which brought up a mix of emotions but overall was comforting.
Deborah's experience with her mother's friends allowed her to appreciate her mother more and gain a new perspective on her life.
Deborah looked through her mother's photos with her friends and found it sweet and nostalgic.
Deborah believes that photos and memories can help in appreciating the special bond with loved ones and the strength of human relationships.
The beach where Deborah got married and discovered her love for surfing holds special memories of joy and peace for her.
Deborah finds doing yoga on the beach with the ocean, sand, and fresh air peaceful and a perfect way to take care of herself.
Jolene: Jolene finds comfort and calmness in creating a serene yoga space with candles, oils, and soothing music.
Jolene uses essential oils and soothing music to create a peaceful atmosphere for relaxation during yoga and meditation.
Jolene's room is her haven for peace and rest where she goes to relax and recharge after a busy day.
Jolene has a pet named Susie who has been with her for two years and brings her comfort and peace.
Jolene believes pets like Susie make life brighter and bring comfort and peace.
